  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, Game game)
      Constructor of the player class.
      Parameters:
      name - the player's username, unique in the lobby.
      game - the game the player is participating to.

  • Method Details

    • isDisconnected

      public boolean isDisconnected()
      Indicates if the player is disconnected.
      Returns:
      true if the player is disconnected.

    • setDisconnected

      public void setDisconnected(boolean disconnected)
      Sets the status of the player (disconnected or connected). Updates the number of disconnected players in the game.
      Parameters:
      disconnected - Status of the connection of the client linked to this player.

      Returns:
      true if the player was the first to reach 20 points.

      Sets the player as the first to have played.

    • isFirstToPlay

      public boolean isFirstToPlay()
      Indicates if the player was the first to have played.
      Returns:
      true only if the player was the first to have played.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(Player receiver, String message) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Sends a private message to another player.
      Parameters:
      receiver - the player who will receive the message.
      message - the message text.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the receiver is not in the game.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String message)
      Player sends a global message (received by all the players in the lobby).
      Parameters:
      message - message text.

    • displayMessage

      public void displayMessage(Player sender, String message)
      Displays a message in the chat log. If the chat log is full, the oldest message is removed.
      Parameters:
      sender - player who sent the message.
      message - message text.

    • getPlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard getPlayerBoard()
      Gets the player's board.
      Returns:
      the personal board of this player.

      Adds a card to the player's hand

      Removes a card from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      cardToRemove - card to remove from the hand.

    • addObjCompleted

      public void addObjCompleted()
      Adds one to the counter that keeps track of how many objectives the player has completed.

    • getObjCompleted

      public int getObjCompleted()
      Gets the counter of how many objectives the player has completed.
      Returns:
      the number of objective the player has completed.

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard(LinkedList<Card> deck) throws EmptyException, NotInTurnException, FullHandException
      Picks the top card of the deck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      deck - deck from which the player draws.
      Throws:
      EmptyException - if the player tries to draw from an empty deck.
      NotInTurnException - if the player is not in turn.
      FullHandException - if the player has 3 cards in hand.

    • canDraw

      public void canDraw(LinkedList<Card> deck) throws EmptyException, NotInTurnException, FullHandException
      Check if the player can draw from a specified deck.
      Parameters:
      deck - deck from which the player wants to draw from.
      Throws:
      EmptyException - if the deck is empty.
      NotInTurnException - if the player is not in DRAW_CARD state.
      FullHandException - if player's hand is full so there's no space for another card.

    • drawCardFromBoard

      public Card drawCardFromBoard(Card card) throws CardNotFoundException, NotInTurnException, FullHandException
      Permits the player to take one card from the board, then replaces it with the same type card drew from the decks
      Parameters:
      card - taken by the player
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException
      NotInTurnException
      FullHandException

    • canDrawFromBoard

      public void canDrawFromBoard(Card card) throws CardNotFoundException, NotInTurnException, FullHandException
      Checks if the player can draw from the board
      Parameters:
      card - the player wants to take
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - the card the player wants to draw isn't on the board
      NotInTurnException - the player is not in the DRAW_CARD state
      FullHandException - player's hand is full

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Card card, int[] coordinates) throws OccupiedCornerException, NotInTurnException, AlreadyUsedPositionException, CostNotSatisfiedException, InvalidCoordinatesException
      Place card then removes it from the player's hand
      Parameters:
      card - to place
      coordinates - of the place where the card will be placed
      Throws:
      NotInTurnException - player is not in PLACE_CARD state
      OccupiedCornerException - one of the corners CardToBePlaced will cover is already covered or is hidden
      CostNotSatisfiedException - player doesn't own enough resources to place a gold card
      AlreadyUsedPositionException - player tries to place a card in a position already occupied by another card
      InvalidCoordinatesException - player tries to place a card on a spot not linked with any other card

    • canPlace

      public void canPlace(CornerEnum cornerPosition, int[] coordinates, Card cardToBePlaced) throws NotInTurnException, OccupiedCornerException, CostNotSatisfiedException, AlreadyUsedPositionException
      Checks if the player can place a card in a specified position
      Parameters:
      cornerPosition - position of one of the corner the card will be placed on
      coordinates - position of the card containing the corner on cornerPosition
      cardToBePlaced - card the player wants to place
      Throws:
      NotInTurnException - player is not in PLACE_CARD state
      OccupiedCornerException - one of the corners CardToBePlaced will cover is already covered or is hidden
      CostNotSatisfiedException - player doesn't own enough resources to place a gold card
      AlreadyUsedPositionException - player tries to place a card in a position already occupied by another card
